message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I really like the product, but $100 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I can meet you halfway at $92.50, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $92.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87.50?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I can meet you at $89. Would you be willing to meet me at $89?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get it a bit lower. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $90, Bob. I think we're close to a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
